  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085829</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Finding your audience: a primer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Ihrer Publikum: eine Zündkapsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conclusion de vos assistances : une amorce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrando suas audiências: um primer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Individuazione dei vostri pubblici: un 
iniettore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εύρεση του ακροατηρίου σας: ένας εγχυτήρας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encontrar a sus audiencias: una cartilla</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Before you sit down to write something, ask yourself some questions about the people who will read it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bevor Sie hinsitzen, um etwas zu schreiben, 
stellen Sie sich einige Fragen über die Leute, die es lesen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Avant que vous vous asseyiez pour écrire quelque 
chose, posez-vous quelques questions sur le peuple qui la lira.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Antes que você se sente para baixo para escrever 
algo, faça-se algumas perguntas sobre os povos que o lerão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prima che vi sediate giù per scrivere qualcosa, 
facciasi alcune domande riguardo alla gente che la leggerà.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προτού να καθίσετε για να γράψετε κάτι, αναρωτηθείτε 
μερικές ερωτήσεις για τους ανθρώπους που θα το διαβάσουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Antes de que usted se siente abajo para escribir 
algo, hágase algunas preguntas acerca de la gente que lo leerá.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
